categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Quell system was a star system in the Nuiri sector, located in the northern Outer Rim Territories. It contained the planet Quell, a world of strategic importance.

In 22 BBY, as part of the Clone Wars, a battle took place between the Confederacy of Independent Systems and the Galactic Republic in the highest levels of the Quell's atmosphere. The engagement ended with the eradication of Jedi General Aayla Secura's Republic fleet, and a Separatist victory.
